resources.string:
If you want to add a custom workout to the application , follow this simple step ro create your own workout.
 1st Step on the home screen application , theres a 3 dot located at the top left of the application
 2nd Step after that It will show a menu selection , after that click Add WorkOut.
 3rd Name your Workout Name , Repetition and Rest Time.
 Example :
 Workout Name : Push Up
 Workout Time : 10 mite 
 Repetition : 50 times Push Up
 Rest Time : 30 Second

Creating account is easy with these you can easily make an account to help your workout , With these easy step.
 1st Open your application
 2nd Below the “Login” Button there’s a text “No account yet?Create one !” , click that text
 3rd After that input your Email address and your desire password.
 The Email and the password that you input in the application will be available right away , to login to the application.

If you want to see your own workout that you have added to the application , just follow this simple step and you will be able to see the List of your workouts.
 1st Step on the home screen application , theres a 3 dot located at the top left of the application
 2nd Step after that It will show a menu selection , after that click Workout List.
 It will direct you to the list of the workout that you have added to the application.
Contact us at this Email : workouthelper@gmail.com , our staff will help you immediately.

A rose is a woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa, in the family Rosaceae, or the flower it bears. There are over a hundred species and thousands of cultivars. They form a group of plants that can be erect shrubs.
UX / UI Mobile Application\nFront-End Android Developer
This is a demo app for Linear Timer.
Linear Timer is a custom view library for Android that creates circular progress animation with respect to a given duration.
Know more about Linear Timer on Github; Click here.
